CustomField.description: Returns net ACV only when BL Forecast Category is Commit and net value is greater than 0. Uses Renewal_Net_Change for existing customers (Prior Opp ACV > 0), otherwise ACV for new business.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Eudia_Tech__c, ISPICKVAL(BL_Forecast_Category__c, "Commit"), IF(Prior_Opp_ACV__c > 0, Renewal_Net_Change__c, ACV__c) > 0 ), IF(Prior_Opp_ACV__c > 0, Renewal_Net_Change__c, ACV__c), 0 )
CustomField.label: Quarterly Commit Net (AI-Enabled)
